title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 55-1.2 - Eligibility for approval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 55-1.2 - Eligibility for approval

State Regulations

Only laboratories or institutions will be approved in which the use of living animals for the purposes set forth in section
55-1.1
of this Subpart will be under the immediate supervision of persons qualified by training and experience to conduct scientific work. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
55-1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
